reviewText: These four gorgeous, talented men - David, USA; Sebastian, France; Hurs, Switzerland; & Carlos, Spain make up an evening of "don't take your eyes off them or else you'll miss something" entertainment! However, this DVD was a little disappointment in comparison to the IL DIVO: LIVE at the Greek Theatre, whereby they sing many more well-known songs! But either way, they are still AWESOME!
summary: Fantastic talent from four gorgeous men!!
Title: N/A

reviewText: Enjoyed the interviews with the group, its interesting to hear move about their beginnings, lives before IL Divo.  They are a wonderful, talented group of handsome young men.  I hope they are around for a long time.  Saw them in Atlanta and it was a wonderful concert.  BHamilton
Title: N/A

reviewText: Il Divo is an exceptionally talented group. But, this DVD is a disappointment as it only contains 5 pieces of music. The packaging appears to be a full concert, and there is no information in the ads to indicate that the presentation is so limited. The music is great, but I did expect more than 5 four minute songs with some fireworks in the background.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I am only disappointed that there are only 5 songs, but I didn't pay but $12 with s/h and the interviews were great.  The song selection is nice and with my surround sound system the sound is wonderful.  I love the DVD and am very glad that I now own 3 DVDs and 3 CDs of this wonderful group. What a favorite group of singers.
Title: N/A

reviewText: IL Divo at the coliseum leads off with the best version of Amazing Grace that I ever heard. It will get to you. The songs are beautifully songs and this DVD is wonderful. Only problem that I had it only has 6 songs. If you are a fan then I say buy it.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I thought that they would have the entire list of songs on the dvd as were on their cd of The Promise.Five songs only. Il Divo are great singers and I love listening to them. When I buy a dvd of a concert, I want more that 5 songs. I was very disappointed in this dvd. Sellers please list the contents of cds and dvds.

reviewText: Il Divo has been a favorite with me for some time.  I love all their albums, and wish I could attend one of their conserts.  I would recomend this to everyone.

reviewText: Great music to enjoy many times.  It is well presented and the video is excellent.  I really enjoyed it.  I have seen this group in person in Greece and this performance was made up of difference selections.
summary: Great Performance for someone who lives classical music.
Title: N/A

reviewText: I want the MUSIC - I don't care about all the interviews and such. I can go on-line and find those if I want them. Only 5 songs, as others have noted -- tremendously disappointing. Must note, however, that AMAZING GRACE almost (ALMOST!) makes this OK...As others have said, I won't buy another DVD of this group unless I know for SURE that I am getting an ENTIRE CONCERT (they did do more than 5 songs at Pula, Croatia... at least, I hope so...) Many will just watch the clips on YouTube instead... sad, but true -- and especially sad for Il Divo.
summary: 5 songs? Well, there is AMAZING GRACE!

reviewText: My mom loves this music. She can't understand a word of almost all of the songs but she still blasts it enough to annoy her neighbors and coworkers.

reviewText: Wonderful. These guys are awesome, so talented. Beautiful setting and lighting, feels like you are there. Love the interviews too.

reviewText: It was fantastic and I'm extremely happy that I purchased it. I love both the music and the interviews with the guys. I'm not a religious man, but when they sing "Amazing Grace" it practially lifts me off the floor. I play the DVD for everyone who comes over. Everyone has loved it. Keep it up you guys (Il Divo). Looking forward to more CD's from you.
